wikipedia_page.main: Samuel Luke Gwynne (born 17 December 1987) is an English footballer who plays  as a midfielder for Westfields.

response: John Trewick managed his first full season at the club, having taken charge of the club for the final two matches of the 2008–09 season. Former manager Graham Turner remained as chairman and director of football. Trewick built an almost entirely new squad, with just four players – Matt Done, Sam Gwynne, Craig Jones and Richard Rose – retained from the previous season.
